description: An extra large tactical multi-compartment backpack that has ample space for storage as well as a mag compartment. Meant to offer as much storage while not being as encumbering
A custom-built heavy duffel bag with lots of straps and pouches to offer more storage.
A small cardboard box filled with MRE's.
A sturdy cardboard box, filled with MRE's. Great for munching.
//: Volume is much lower than the actual volume of a box this size because presumably if it's in your pack, it isn't empty and full of air; and if it's in your hands, it's irrelevant what the volume is.
